html:
7.4.19  8:40 pm   are u a robot?

     not sure, but i can crush captchas

7.4.19  7:05 pm   I set myself to a schedule and sometimes I can keep it and make good stuff and sometimes I can't keep it because I need more time to make bad stuff good stuff. SCHEDULE OR QUALITY. What's the third answer here?

     i received a very genuine and profound honest answer to that question from a stranger on an extremely short elevator ride. i barely had time to explain the problem (exactly the same situation you explained above) because the elevator ride was so short. but as we arrived at his floor, i said "which one is it? what's the answer?". there was just enough time before the doors closed for him to decisevely inform me, "i think you need both." this was profound to me, but admittedly a clear 3rd answer is still needed

7.4.19  5:33 pm   I've always wondered, why are your videos so surreal, and yet make sense and are hilarious? 

     that was a business strategy i embarked on long ago

7.4.19  5:05 pm   Why can't you just release a hint on Instagram if more than half the video's already done?

     more than half the video is not done

7.4.19  4:33 pm   your instrumental 'meadow music' is gorgeous. did it any way inspire the groove you'd use later for movie star?

     no, they were both inspired surely by the tempo marking

7.4.19  4:10 pm   out of all the songs you made, which would you consider your favorite. personally i really like the melody of "i wanna be a movie star" but id like to know what you think since you made them

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.4.19  4:00 pm   7.2.19  9:07 pm How come your songs don't use guitars anyways? You've shown them in videos but the songs all sound like they favor keyboards.

     i unfortunately am not a guitar player

7.4.19  3:58 pm   are you enjoying america day

     it's a little loud

7.4.19  2:59 pm   how do you signify inversions/positions using an arabic harmonic naming system?

     i use the master numbers of the scale. 4/6 means 4 over 6, which in the key of C would mean F/A

7.4.19  1:59 pm   What's an answer to a question that nobody here has asked?

     ARKit

7.4.19  12:25 pm   Are you still allowed to celebrate 4th of July even if you don't live in the United States?

     yes

7.4.19  11:18 am   if death is the opposite of birth, then what is the opposite of life?

     nothing

7.4.19  10:06 am   Can you question a question while questioning yourself, and your own question?

     yes but that is a very advanced technique

7.4.19  9:08 am   is it possible to time travel on a broomstick

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.4.19  8:43 am   if you cut a sandwich in half do you have two  halves of a sandwich or two sandwiches? sorry if i asked this before

     it mostly depends on the size and shape of the sandwich(s)

7.4.19  1:10 am   bill you're one of my very favorite people, and i'm really glad that you seem to be becoming less neutral and more opinionated. if you don't wanna be becoming more opinionated i'm sorry i pointed it out. anyway, it makes me really happy so thanks.

     i disagree

7.4.19  12:49 am   what happened with the "même" posts you used to do here on your page in 2013?

     those were quite simple. you just slap the text on the image and you're done. much shorter production time than songs, and videos

7.3.19  11:28 pm   I liked your h3 interview you did in December. Are you ever planning to do more interviews in the near future when you have the time and/or get an offer?

     yes

7.3.19  11:12 pm   do you shlapp bAss?

     not usually

7.3.19  10:19 pm   Thoughts on Hollywood?

     seems legit

7.3.19  9:32 pm   what are some other examples of progressions that are in a key that the I or i chord isnt played often?

     
california girls (katy perry).
ain't no stoppin us now.(t mcfadden/whitehead)
i'm every woman (chaka/whitney)
too close (next)
rock with you (mj)
rock the boat (aaliyah)
one more time (daft p) holiday (madonna)
woman got to have it (bobby womack) you da f best (drake)
work work (rihanna)
and much much more!

      Like the "everything is you" progression ? Do you think the characteristic "miss you dearly" sound is in part by this tonic center not visited as a I or i chord frequently? 

     that's just the way it sounds when you play 4maj7 in that way

7.3.19  9:30 pm   should i run away

     where are you now

7.3.19  8:04 pm   is home good or bad

     rad

7.3.19  7:50 pm   did you switch to windows?

     no

7.3.19  7:22 pm   how to know which car to buy

     buy the one with wheels!!!!

7.3.19  7:11 pm   what do you think about politics?

     my great great grand step sister was a politic

7.3.19  7:02 pm   What else did the Easter bunny tell you, we need to know the inside scoop

     besides what

7.3.19  6:48 pm   In the video help! I'm lost in a calendar, are you still lost in the calendar?

     i was not the one lost in the calendar. that was a portrayal of someone lost in a calendar, from the first person point of view

7.3.19  6:16 pm   There are some people who somehow manage to hyperlink to a previously asked question in their questions on this page (for example the 7.2.19  10:05 am one)...
This may be a stupid question but, how is that done?? Thanks!

     it is automatic

7.3.19  5:34 pm   how's the new computer

     old

7.3.19  5:33 pm   do you have any special techniques for memorization?

     having a strong interest for the material

      i think very few people would opt for the memorizing hertz frequencies route as opposed to just abandoning Yamaha and calling middle c C4, so i figure you gotta have some penchant for memorizing

     there was the feeling of wanting to have proper names for the notes in an absolute sense which doesn't need the letter at all. for example, if you took the letter away from the C4 C5 system, you'd have 4s for the entire octave, etc . .. it's nice to have an independent number system for really just saying how high something is. more for sonic reasons

7.3.19  5:07 pm   When did your technological transformation start?

     around june 18th

      What prompted it, and what made it come at that time rather than any other?

     a botched youtube rental

7.3.19  4:36 pm   7.2.19  3:57 pm the most latest one.

      that would be lame

7.3.19  2:28 pm   Why no post on twitter?

     i discovered some other websites

7.3.19  2:18 pm   Did you forget about the improv page?

     no, did you

7.3.19  1:35 pm   What's your future goal? 

     wouldn't be able to say, until it has occured

7.3.19  1:12 pm   when will i finally dominate the world

     tuesday

7.3.19  12:58 pm   if you had a YouTube red series, what would it be?

     wouldn't be able to say what it is, until it is released

7.3.19  12:52 pm   Can I get help?

     yes, and give it

7.3.19  12:00 pm   I have a feeling that you don't make music for the fame or money. So then, why is it you do what you do and put so much time into it? I'm also under the assumption that you have other hobbies/a job, so WHERE do you find the time you put into it?

     time is everywhere

7.3.19  11:16 am   could you start adding timestamps of when you UPLOAD the reality videos and not just when they were recorded?

     it's there next to the other date in 'invisible ink'

7.3.19  10:46 am   Is the "that's the way I like to live my life" in "Hi I'm Steve" in Eb?

     no

7.3.19  10:38 am   teach me music stuff :(

     i will try

7.3.19  10:26 am   re: names for notes on the keyboard, I think you could just use the International Organization for Standardization system of octave numbering (middle C, 262hz = C4). I know Yamaha calls it C3 but they're more wrong rather than simply different.

     the only problem with that for me is reconciling that the/a brand i like greatly and (most) commonly use is "wrong"

7.3.19  9:40 am   Why should we hire you?

     who is this

7.3.19  7:57 am   Is this a question?

     let me run some tests

7.3.19  7:52 am   The music video you are making better be the greatest you've ever made if it's taking this long to finish.

     actually there are other things going on too

      Can't wait to see it!

7.3.19  2:47 am   Why do I love your music so much?

     could be because of the political views it expresses

7.3.19  1:50 am   So if humans were hypnotized by an intelligent alien species, what would be the most likely thing we would be forced to do for them.

     pay compulsary financial charges

      And would we enjoy it?

     yes
